text: wamin alqawm aladhin hawl (almdyn) aerab mnafqwn, wamin 'ahl (almdyn) munafiqun 'aqamuu ealaa alnfaq, wazdaduu fih tghyanana, bihayth yakhfaa ealayk -ayha alrswl- amrhm, nahn nelmhm, sanueadhibuhum mrtyn: balqtl walsby walfdyht fi aldnya, wbedhab alqbr baed almwt, thuma yuraddun yawm alqiamat 'iilaa eadhab eazim fi nar jhnm
